alert.note: Alert for Gates of the Mountains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 2:17PM MST until January 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Gates of the Mountains and Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 5 AM Thursday to 11 AM MST Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM Thursday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
